# initialKey

**Instance Property**

The string used as the initial key name for a newly inserted item.

## Declaration

```swift
var initialKey: String { get set }
```

## Setting Initial Key and Values

- **initialValue**: The string used as the initial value for a newly inserted item.

items.description: The string used as the initial value for a newly inserted item.
items.name: initialValue
